.
Considering Entitlement to A&A as an Inferred Issue
If a single disability is evaluated as 100-percent disabling, consider entitlement to A&A or the housebound rate as an inferred issue
only if
the evidence shows that the benefit may be awarded.Â  If the evidence does
not
show entitlement to SMC at the A&A or housebound rate, do not raise either issue merely to deny it.
